parameter.name: config_3
parameter.label: 3: Night Light
parameter.description: Defines the behavior of the blue LED. Default is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.

options.option: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

parameter.name: config_4
parameter.label: 4: Invert Switch
parameter.description: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON. Note: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, remember the load will now be controlled by the right, not the left switch.

parameter.name: config_5
parameter.label: 5: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
parameter.description: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

parameter.name: config_7
parameter.label: 7: On/Off Command Dim Step
parameter.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameter.name: config_8
parameter.label: 8: On/Off Command Dim Rate
parameter.description: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
